Posts.Content: annettem wrote: I'm am so confused right now.  I am 8 years "cancer free".  I moved to a new State 3 years ago and am just not sure about my Oncologists office.  They surely don't do things the way I'm used to.  Does anyone know how long you should have your tumor markers checked?  Is anyone else this far out of dx?  Does your doctor do blood work when you go in?  The oncologist I've been seeing does nothing other than give me a breast exam.  I feel like what's the purpose of going to him?  My gynecologist does that once a year.  Heck, my primary doc can do that as well.  I have a new issue with the opposite breast and I feel like it's just being written off as a dense breast.  I have a ton of pain and I know that cancer usually doesn't cause pain but something just doesn't feel right.  I'm so mixed up right now.  Help me please!? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Confused! annettem zouping
